name: Search (itch)
description:
《Search》 is a pixel wind screen 2D action adventure game

The background is set in the far future with the development of mechanical network and biotechnology. With the development of science and technology, human civilization has been expanded unprecedentedly. However, it seems that at a certain point in time, something unexpected happened, which led to the destruction of human beings. Under this doomsday, what is Neo looking for? Is there any hope to save the future belonging to mankind

Game play: by avoiding and attacking the enemy in the game, we can explore in the game scene, and learn skills and strengthen skills through the falling objects of the enemy

Game features:

  • pixel wind screen
  • science fiction theme
  • characteristic enemy and boss
  • parts upgrade skill system
  • exciting platform action adventure
